Load necessary files and libaries.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
df <- read_tsv("hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)
```
Plot kc counts across 1mb slices of hg19 per chromosome
```{r}
plt <- ggplot(df,aes(x=start,y=count)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(chr),5,5,scales="free")

ggsave("exercise1.png",width=10,height = 10)

plt

```
